name: HYATT house Boston/Burlington

reviews.text: This hotel is just like all other review, excellent in its class. We stayed for only one night. This hotel is very clean, the staffs are friendly, and the price was excellent, we only pay $89 for one night. The free breakfast was also excellent, many choices and kids friendly. I would definitely stay again. And if you stay before June 30, 2006, you will get a free 3000 points for the Goldpass memebership, which can be redeemed for another free night at any Summerfield Suite.
reviews.title: Great stay. Clean hotel.

aka: Hyatt Summerfield Suites Boston/Burlington Hotel Burlington
